data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 500 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Ancestor's Blessing
data.description: Healing abilities have a 25% chance to also increase your target's AP by 50. This effect will not work on yourself.

data.name: Ancestor's Echo
data.description: Direct heals you cast have a 25% chance to create a shield on your target that can absorb up to X damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Ancestral Inheritance
data.description: Gain a 660 unique bonus to armor.

data.name: Blessing of Grimnir
data.description: Heals all groupmembers within 100 feet for X health.

data.name: Cleansing Vitality
data.description: Rune of Cleansing will now heal the defensive target for X over 9 seconds if an effect was successfully removed.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to willpower.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Alaric's Apprentice
data.description:
Groupmates imbued with the Oath Rune of Power will leave a Rune of Madness on enemies they strike. Your Master Rune will leave a Rune of Madness on enemies it hits. Rune of Madness lasts for 10s, and you deal X% more damage to target's afflicted.

You cannot cast Rune of Life, Rune of Cleansing, Blessing of Grimnir, or Blessing of Valaya.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Efficient Runecarving
data.description: While under the effects of your Rune of Breaking; each time you deal direct damage, your defensive target is healed for 50% of the damage dealt. You gain 10% disrupt strikethrough.

data.name: Extended Battle
data.description: Increases area of effect of Rune Of Cleaving and Rune Of Battle by 50%.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Grimnir's Fury
data.note: Can only be cast upon a group mate.
data.description: Resurrect a fallen group members and does not cause resurrection sickness. Anyone resurrected by this effect will regain 50% of their hit points.

data.name: Grimnir's Shield
data.description: You will take only 50% damage and your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points for 10 seconds. During this time you generate almost no threat, and can not be set back while casting.

data.name: Grimnir's Gift
data.description: Grungni blesses your target, restoring X health.

data.name: Immolating Grasp
data.description: Each tick of Rune of Immolation has a 25% chance to drain 30 action points from target and snare them by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Mountain Spirit
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet gain a 1320 morale bonus to armor and a 504 morale bonus to all resistances for 10 secons.

data.name: Oath Rune of Iron
data.description:
Targeted group member gains a (2 * rank) ability bonus to initiative and willpower for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate it to restore X health over 10 seconds.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Oath Rune of Power
data.description:
Targeted group member gains a (3 * rank) ability bonus to strength, ballistic skill, and intelligence for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate to inflict a (3 * rank) ability penalty to toughness to a target for 10s.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Oath Rune of Sanctuary
data.description:
Targeted group member gains a (2 * rank) ability bonus to toughness for 1 hour. The rune holder will then be able to resurrect themselves with 20% health if killed within the next 10 minutes. Doing so will remove the Oath Rune.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Oath Rune of Warding
data.description:
Targeted group member gains a X ability bonus to all resistances for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate it to gain a Y unique bonus to resistance for 10 seconds.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: On Your Feet!
data.description: Rune of Life, Rune of Sanctuary and Grimnir's Fury will heal the target for X health over 5 seconds and will restore 70 action points when the target is resurrected.

data.name: Potent Runes
data.description: Rune of Striking and Rune of Immolation are now undefendable.

data.name: Protection of the Ancestors
data.description:
Target group member gains a X unique bonus to wounds for 60 seconds. Heals target for value of HP increase.
If cast on a target with Rune of Warding active, they gain a X absorb for 10s.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Regenerative Shielding
data.description: Each tick of Rune of Regeneration has 25% chance to cause the target to gain a 1056 unique bonus to armor 10 seconds. Additionally, 10% less armor will be bypassed when they are attacked.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 action points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Battle
data.description: Buffs you or a friendly player with a pulsing area of effect that deals X elemental damage every 3 seconds to all enemies within to 30 feet for 15 seconds. Not effected by cooldown reduction abilities.

data.name: Rune of Binding
data.description: Wounds your target for X elemental damage. If the target is afflicted with a Rune of Power the target is stagged for 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Rune of Breaking
data.description:
When this ability is toggled on, you gain the Rune of Breaking, converting your healing power, willpower, and healing critical chance bonuses from items into magic power, intelligence, and magic critical chance.

When this ability is toggled off, you gain the Rune of Balance, converting your magic power, intelligence, and magic critical chance bonuses from items into healing power, willpower, and healing critical chance.

data.name: Rune of Burning
data.description: You channel a powerful series of runes around your target which project searing flame into them. Dealing X elemental damage over 6 seconds for as long as you maintain yout concentration.

data.name: Rune of Cleansing
data.note: Target must be Cursed or Ailing
data.description: Your rune cleanses an ally, removing one curse or ailment.

data.name: Rune of Cleaving
data.description: A burst of force errupts from your rune dealing X elemental damage over 9 seconds to the targets 40 feet in front of you.

data.name: Rune of Ending
data.description: Deals 800 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and then heals all group members within 100 feet for all damage dealt.

data.name: Rune of Fire
data.description: Deals X elemental damage

data.name: Rune of Immolation
data.description: You set your target ablaze. Burning them for X elemental damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Insanity
data.description: Deal 600 damage to target. Lower target's AP by 200.

data.name: Rune of Life
data.description: Resurrect target friendly dead player and restore 20% of their health.

data.name: Rune of Mending
data.description:
Restores X health, then continues to restore Y health over 5 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

Restores Z and then continues to restore A health over 5 seconds if the target is affected by a Rune of Iron.

data.name: Rune of Might
data.description: Your Master Rune transmits a surge of power through the ground dealing X elemental damage to all targets within 30 feet of it.

data.name: Rune of Nullification
data.description: Critical attacks place a debuff on your target that reduces all incoming healing by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Preservation
data.description: Detaunts targets attack power to 50% for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Rune of Rebirth
data.description: Self heal for 1200 then an additional 2403 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Regeneration
data.description: You call upon a regenerative rune restoring X heatlth over 15 seconds to your target.

data.name: Rune of Restoration
data.description:
Restores X health.
This is a fragile spell, and will always be set back by a large amount if you are damaged while casting it.

data.name: Rune of Serenity
data.description: Heals target for X life over 9 seconds, and will then bounce to and heal other allies within 30 feet of the previous target. Effect will not hit the same target more than once, and will heal up to 6 people.

data.name: Rune of Shielding
data.description: Target absorbs up to X damage over 10 seconds. When the effect fades, the target recovers Y health.

data.name: Rune of Skewering
data.description: Deals 1600 damage to all targets 40 feet in front of you.

data.name: Rune of Striking
data.description: Deals X elemental damage.

data.name: Rune of Sundering
data.description: Knockbacks targets within 30 feet of you. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Runic Blasting
data.description: Increases your magical critical chance by 20% against targets afflicted with Rune of Power. Increases your healing critical chance by 20% against targets afflicted with Rune of Iron.

data.name: Spellbinding Rune
data.description: Silences and wounds target for X elemental damage over 4 seconds.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 900 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for a half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Stoutness of Stone
data.description: You recover from stuns and knockdowns 50% quicker. You will still gain immunity based on the original duration.

data.name: Stubbornness
data.description: Gain a 252 unique bonus to corporeal resistance.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: All of your heals will cause enemy monsters to hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Sundered Motion
data.description: Rune of Sundering's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds and will now apply a 40% movement reduction for 10 seconds to all those hit.

data.name: Swift Runes
data.description: Cooldown on Rune of Cleansing is removed and the cost increased to 40 action points.

data.name: Thick-Skulled
data.description: Removes chance to be setback while casting Grungni's Gift, Rune of Mending and Rune of Serenity.

data.name: Valaya's Shield
data.description: Heals your groupmates within 100 feet 1596 health over 15 seconds and gives 375 action points over 15 seconds

data.name: Rune of Speed
data.note: You cannot target yourself with this ability.
data.description: Restore X health to target. If target is affected by Rune of Iron, the target's abilities build up 0.5s faster for 10 seconds. If target is affected by Rune of Warding, the target gains 20% movement speed for 5 seconds.

data.name: Cleave My Runes (PH)
data.description: Rune of Cleaving now causes the targets to take a X unique penalty to armor and a Y unique penalty to elemental resistance for 9s.

data.name: Master Rune
data.note:
You can only have 1 master rune active at a time.
This ability does not trigger the GCD.
data.description: You inscribe a Master Rune into the ground for 20 seconds. Group mates within 100ft are healed for X every 3 seconds. Enemies within 30ft are dealt Y elemental damage every 3 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Fury
data.description: Group mates within 100ft of your Master Rune gain 50 AP. This ability is not affected by cooldown reduction abilities.

data.name: Blessing of Valaya
data.description: Group mates within 100ft of your Master Rune are healed for X. For the next 10s, the power of any heals used on them is increased by 25%.
